metadata.name: 15.8.1 Number of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
metadata.target: 15.8 By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
metadata.definition: The indicator takes the value 1 for the countries that have adopted the relevant national legislation and appropriate measures for the prevention and control of invasive alien species.
metadata.methodology: Poland adopted the following legislation that control of invasive alien species:  1. Act of 16 April 2004 on the Protection of Nature  2. Regulation of the Minister of the Environment of 9 Septemer 2011 on the list of non-native species of plants and animals, which in the case of release into the environment can threaten native species or natural habitats
metadata.source: the Ministry of Climate and Environment
